channel.title: Easy rsc help on ips
channel.description: well im not really into rsc servers anymore, so im just going to make a easy rsc one, ok, where do i put my ips?, i have 192.168.0.100, and my ip 24.215.67.2 where do i put these ips? i seen server.java and put my 192 in it and no one can log on which ips do i put in conf.xml, this has nothing do to with my client

item.title: Easy rsc help on ips

this has nothing do to with my client[/quote]

You have been here a long time now are you still so fucking stupid ou can’t use the search bar?

item.title: Easy rsc help on ips
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

The default gateway (192.168.0.100) goes into your Server.java (search for “localhost” and replace it).

The IP 24.215.67.2 goes in your settings.ini file (client side).

Replace:

server=127.0.0.1

With:

server=24.215.67.2

Read full topic
